employmentIncome.description: Total employment income across all employments

shareSchemes.description: An object containing share scheme information

selfEmploymentIncome.description: Total taxable profit for all self employments

selfEmployment.description: An array of self employment income

partnership.description: An array of partnership source income

ukPropertyIncome.description: Profit from UK land and property

ukProperty.description: An object containing UK property income data

foreignDividendIncome.description: Amount of taxable income from foreign dividends

trustsIncome.description: Amount of taxable income from trust and estates

trusts.description: An object detailing trust and estate income

bbsiIncome.description: The amount of Interest from UK banks, building societies and securities etc

bbsi.description: An object detailing sources of bank and building society interest

ukDividendIncome.description: Amount of taxable income from dividends from UK companies

ukDividends.description: An object detailing UK dividend income

ukPensionsIncome.description: Amount of taxable UK pensions and state benefits

ukPensions.description: An object detailing pensions and state benefit source

gainsOnLifeInsuranceIncome.description: Amount of taxable gains on life insurance policies etc.

gainsOnLifeInsurance.description: An object detailing source for gains of life insurance
